alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 1:59PM PST until December 27 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches below 6000 feet and 4 to 12 inches above 6000 feet, with amounts increasing with elevation. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will create areas of blowing and drifting snow, leading to near zero visibility at times. * WHERE...Northern Elko County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
